title: Amazon Product Performance Daily Report
description: Daily report presenting the performance metrics for a specific product on Amazon

merchantID.description: A unique merchant code for GRAAS clients

siteNickNameId.description: A unique merchant's store code for GRAAS clients

Parent_ASIN.description: Parent Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) of the product

Child_ASIN.description: Child Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) of the product

Title.description: Title or name of the product

SKU.description: Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) of the product

Sessions_Total.description: Total number of sessions for the product

Session_Percentage_Total.description: Percentage of total sessions for the product

Page_Views_Total.description: Total number of page views for the product

Page_Views_Percentage_Total.description: Percentage of total page views for the product

Featured_Offer_Buy_Box_Percentage.description: Percentage of sessions where the product is the featured offer in the buy box

Units_Ordered.description: Total number of units ordered for the product

Unit_Session_Percentage.description: Percentage of units ordered per session

Total_Order_Items.description: Total number of order items for the product

Date.description: Date of the report in the format 'MM-DD-YYYY'
